content:
Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 20}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 27, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft an andesite wall, I need to first craft four andesites. Andesite requires placing 1 diorite and 1 cobblestone side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the diorite from slot 13 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 20}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 27, "index": 43}]

thought: Since the diorite has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the cobblestone to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the cobblestone to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 58, "index": 20}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 27, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the andesite by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

thought: To craft an andesite_wall, I need to place 6 andesite in a 2x3 pattern in the crafting table. Since there are not enough andesite in my inventory, I will first need to craft more andesite. Andesite requires placing 1 diorite and 1 cobblestone side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the diorite from slot 13 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
